column2: Mistresses from the Bondage Club gather to meet you and introduce themselves.
They congratulate you on your promotion and talk about future club events.
You're provided with the official Bondage Club Mistress padlocks and keys.
After a while, they bring in the bound maids to serve drinks and refreshments.
You meet many new Dominant friends who now address you as "Mistress".
Once the party is over, everyone walks away, and the club resume its activities.
